content.rendered:
INFRASTRUCTURE

Overview

R&D (Research and Development) is a process of continual improvement that aims to validate and enhance the quality of the product. Suguna focuses profoundly on R&D initiatives and has exclusive R&D centres led by highly skilled poultry professionals, nutritionists, and veterinarians

Suguna focuses profoundly on R&D initiatives and has exclusive R&D centres led by highly skilled poultry professionals, nutritionists, and veterinarians
